body_html: I don't think there's any good way to handle creating Variables from lists -- it's hard to infer what tensor type to choose. We're not aiming for total compatibility of Tensor and Variable interfaces.
body_text: I don't think there's any good way to handle creating Variables from lists -- it's hard to infer what tensor type to choose. We're not aiming for total compatibility of Tensor and Variable interfaces.
body: I don't think there's any good way to handle creating Variables from lists -- it's hard to infer what tensor type to choose. We're not aiming for total compatibility of Tensor and Variable interfaces.
